description: Blake returns for another day of training and this time he's lucky enough to catch Mistress Lorelei on her "nice" day. Strung up by his arms and put into a painful predicament with nothing but clover clamps, twine and a really stretched out nutsac, Blake does his best to satisfy the Divine Miss Lee but seems to fall short. That's ok for Lorelei because that just means more sexy torment and pain! CBT, humiliation, whipping, electrical cock torture, pegging, chastity, tease and denial and ass worship are all included!
title: Your Pain Is My Pleasure
